sentence.Network_en: This gene enables the jellyfish to glow with the bioluminescent protein aequorin.
sentence.Network_cn: 该种基因使水母能够在发光蛋白质的作用下发光.

sentence.Network_en: They also recorded gene expression in real - time using a bioluminescent reporter of gene activity.
sentence.Network_cn: 同时他们采用基因活性生物发光法记录了基因的 实时 表达情况.

sentence.Network_en: This liquefied metal arced and then cascaded into a hollow tower that pulsed with bioluminescent colors.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些熔化的金属发出弧光,落进一个脉动着生物荧光色彩的中空塔.

darkness in Antarctica's Weddell Sea gives this comb jelly a chance to show off its candy - colored bioluminescent cells .南极洲韦德尔海的黑暗，让这只梳形水母有机会向我们展示它发冷光的糖果色细胞。
